title: Leavers in ranked
body:
After numerous seasons and this same issue, I think it's time riot stepped up and addressed the leaver issue in ranked.

On my regular account I lose at least 10% of my games due to leavers or people who DC and due to a tilted MMR, it takes me 2-3 games to make up for something outside of my control.

Today on this account (I just started ranked) straight out of the gate, a summoner (in game name Skykorus) DC's and does not come back (http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/76916855/200073399?tab=overview), now summoner issue aside in my first 10 games to get a place winning these is critical, or else i'll start in bronze, not silver or gold - making the climb to a decent bracket THAT much longer and harder.

How is someone's inability to complete a game a fair weighting on my placements in game? How has something not been addressed in the last few seasons to do ANYTHING about this.

Leavebuster is great and punishes repeat offenders, but even in random DC's these people do not deserve a punishment, the other players need a solution.

Riot, maybe stop churning out cash driving events and focus on fixing your game play.

replies.body: People argue that it balances out with enemies lso getting DCs, but I would much rather a game where no team is impacted by DCs and games are won on elements of the game, 100% of the time.

Exactly this.

Make it so the players affected (same team as the DC) do not suffer a placement loss or a stagnate LP loss and the team that is unaffected gains half the LP.

Obviously tweaks to timing and things need to be worked out to prevent abuse however it seems silly that after so many years this has not been fixed.

The main abuse I can see happening is if someone duos and their partner leaves for them. However, I would assume the partner who left would expect that in return sometime? Also, just don't have this for ranked teams. If duos abusing it is a problem then that can be easily solved, by getting rid of the ability for it to be exploited.
I have won games because people have DCs. I play this game because it is competitive, and that is where the fun in the game is. If people leave the game isn't something you really need to compete for to win anymore, and that ruins both the fun and the integrity of the league system.
they need to stop DELAYING AND INHIBITING PROGRESS OF THE FREE MARKET AND MONEY INTO THE COMPANIES HANDS. leaver penalities should be removed asap. this is what is best for the community.

Leaver buster is live. It hands out incredibly hard punishments whether the DC is intentional or not (no naming and shaming, it is against forum rules).

I would love for you to come up with a system for ranked play that is not easily abused. 
One thing that has been suggested is loss prevented for 4v5 (qq, I'm gonna lose why not afk or bully someone else to the point of afk), also punishing the people on the enemy team who put effort into the match only to get no rewards.
